title: Vale, BHP's Samarco gets license to resume operations after dam burst
text:
Vale, BHP's Samarco gets license to resume operations after dam burst

Commodities 1 hour ago (Oct 26, 2019 08:28)

Vale, BHP's Samarco gets license to resume operations after dam burst RIO de Janeiro, Oct 25 (Reuters) - Samarco, a joint venture between Vale SA and BHP Group , on Friday won permission to resume operations at their Germano iron ore mine, the environmental regulator of the Brazilian state of Minas Gerais said, roughly four years after a fatal tailings dam collapse there. Vale has previously said that it expected production at the joint venture, which is trying to restructure $3.8 billion in debt it defaulted on about a year after the accident, to resume in the second half of 2020.
